Articles.Content:
Recently we have been seeing a lot of repetition in the suggestions forum, which makes it harder for original ideas to be noticed. Here you can find a list of topics that have been either suggested many times before or have produced exceptionally fruitful discussions. If you have an idea that has already been suggested please post it in one of these threads instead of starting a new one. For topics that have been suggested many times, the link is to the most recent/popular thread.

Each suggestion also has a development status:

unknown - no comment from a developer

planned - planned for KSP 1.0

maybe - devs think it's a good idea, but reserve the right to change their minds

expansion - not planned for the 1.0 release, but possible subject for an expansion/DLC

not planned - currently not planned for any version of KSP ever

The Universe/Interstellar Travel

  • Multiple star systems [1][2][3][4][5][6]
  • Barycenters [1]
  • More planets [1][2][3]
  • Better/More interesting planetary surfaces [1][2][3][4][5]
  • Bodies with axial tilt [1]
  • Exospheres/orbital decay [1][2]
  • Hibernation [1]

Career Mode

  • "Lose" condition(s) [1]
  • Contracts [1]
  • Improvements to science/Integration with discovery mechanic [1][2][3][4][5][6][7]
  • Improvements to the tech tree [1]
  • Science over time [1]
  • Giving sandbox mode the features of career mode [1][2]
  • More uses for science parts [1][2][3][4]

Parts

  • Fuel-consuming electric generators [1]
  • LVNs act as RTGs [1]
  • Propellers/oxygen-less jets [1][2][3]
  • More plane parts [1][2]
  • Procedural parts [1][2]
  • Unlockable upgrades to existing parts [1]
  • Small jet engines [1]

Construction

  • Building for testing ships in various atmosphere/surface gravities [1][2][3][4][5]
  • More/improved action groups [1][2][3][4][5]
  • Improvements to staging [1][2][3]
  • Multi re-couplers [1][2][3]
  • More symmetry modes [1][2][3][4]
  • More construction buildings [1][2]
  • Stress/structural integrity display [1][2]
  • Revised attachment rules [2][3]

Flight

  • Mapping from orbit [1]
  • Multiple throttle groups [1][2][3][4]
  • Parachutes don't disappear on touchdown [1]
  • Improved flight planning/maneuver nodes [1][2]
  • Mission Creation [1][2][3][4]
  • IVA more interactiveness/visibility [1][2][3][4]

Kerbals

  • Mental Health [1]
  • Physical Health [1]
  • History [1][2][3][4][5][6]
  • Names [1]
  • Customization [1]
  • Crew Management [1][2]
  • Crew Deployment [1]
  • More EVA activities [1][2]
  • First person EVA view [1][2]
  • EVA fine controls [1][2]
  • Specialised Kerbals [1]

User Interface

  • More craft types [1][2]
  • Change nav ball appearance [1][2]
  • Docking alignment indicator [1]
  • Improvements for the color blind/making things easier to see [1][2][3]
  • More start menu screens [1][2]
  • Set vessel type in VAB/SPH [1]
  • Discount flags as "Flights in Progress" and/or stop them showing by default in the Tracking Station [1]
  • More advanced or intuitive fuel transfer options [1]

Optimization

  • Part count reducing fairings [1][2]
  • Multithreading [1][2]

Miscellaneous

  • Better Controls [1][2][3]
  • Mouse Controls [1][2]
  • Planetary transfer protractor [1]
  • Better camera controls [1]
  • More structured suggestions forum [1]
  • Telescopes/Observatories [1][2][3]
  • Dynamic music [1][2]
  • Better sound effects [1][2][3][4]
  • Building interiors [1][2]
  • Improving visual quality [1]

This list may be incomplete, so please post here or let a moderator know if you think it is missing something.

Thanks to Scoundrel for helping me create/organize the list, and thanks to all users who are involved enough to word their ideas and share them with the development team, all the moderators who have helped sort the suggestions and of course to the developers for creating a great game.

Edited December 10, 2014 by chaos_forge
Removed Some Suggestions which have now been implemented as features.

This thread is not for the discussion of any of the above linked topics. Please go to the topic from one of the links and discuss it there. If you have an addition or correction, please keep it simple and just post the needed information.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
